product_name: Baby Jogger Summit X3 Stroller - Single
long_description: The Baby Jogger Summit X3 Stroller boasts all-terrain versatility and a 1-handed, quick-folding design for easy transport and storage when your adventure is over. All-wheel independent suspension delivers a comfortable, smooth ride; 16 in. and 12 in. quick-release wheels have air-filled tires that roll smoothly on changing terrain. Front wheel can pivot freely for mobility or be locked for predictable tracking; front wheel lock can be easily engaged or disengaged while standing behind stroller. Hand-operated rear drum running brakes increase control on hills; stroller includes a parking brake to keep stroller steady when you stop. Main compartment for 1 child has an easy-to-secure, adjustable 5-point seatbelt system with comfy shoulder pads. Padded and adjustable reclining seat offers excellent passenger comfort; seat can recline to nearly-flat position for easy napping on the go. Multi-position sun canopy has top windows and side ventilation panels; retractable weather cover protects passenger if you're caught out in wet or windy weather. Sizeable seat back storage compartment and under-seat basket let you carry more stuff for longer outings. The Baby Jogger Summit X3 Stroller features a 75 lb. weight capacity.
